imdb.plot outline: FARAWAY: Surviving World Cup Russia - This unique, informative, and timely series is an entertaining comedy show, but also contains valuable travel information from a practical point of view. All of the episodes focus on an American comedian and his Russian friend, who is also a translator and tour guide for the American. The two men travel to the 11 Russian cities, where the FIFA 2018 World Cup games will be played. What the two men experience in these cities will be helpful to thousands of soccer fans from all over the world, as these fans arrive in these cities to see their favorite teams play.
imdb.title: Faraway: Surviving World Cup Russia
akas: Faraway: Surviving World Cup Russia (United States)
